title: TIL That Tencents Riot Games and Blizzard have dealt in the past
body:
I left the URL in the picture to help people find this.
https://imgur.com/UlOyyaT

THIN ICE RIOT
_**THIN. ICE.
**_

You guys play and enjoy your selves, but I'm not gonna be a hypocrite. 
I'm outright boycotting league for a while, there are PLENTY of other things I can do.

Anyone got some game suggestions I can add to my list?
